page.title: 03A Typical School Week.
page.content: A Typical School Week. In Maths we did measurements,angles and directions,graphs,maps and co-ordinates.First of all we did measurements.We had to trace a map of a garden then we had to measure different lines.We were finding the correct scale.Then we did degrees.We had to draw a circle and then we putin numbers which went up in tens.We then used this to make a compass.After this we did co-ordinates. After we we had finished all our maths we did English.First we had to read the passage then answer questions on it.Then we had punctuation.Another thing we had to do in English was an essay about the Easter Holidays.I wrote one and a half pages.During the week we also have Art/Craft and Games.Sometimes we have Geography and Music.
